Detailed Description

IGraphicsObject is an interface for providing graphics related functionality. Any objects that modify graphics data are required to implement this class.

virtual u32 IGraphicsObject::GetVertexDeclarationCount ( In u16  nSubMeshIndex = 0  )  [pure virtual]

Returns the number of vertex declaration elements.

Parameters:
nSubMeshIndex The index of the SubMesh being referenced (default = 0).
Returns:

Implemented in UObject, and OGREGraphicsObjectMesh.

virtual void IGraphicsObject::GetVertexDeclaration ( Out VertexDecl::Element *  pVertexDecl,
In u16  nSubMeshIndex = 0 
) [pure virtual]

Returns the declaration for the vertex buffer.

The size of the passed in array must be able to contain the number of elements returned by GetVertexDeclarationCount.

Parameters:
pVertexDecl The filled in vertex declaration array.
nSubMeshIndex The index of the SubMesh being referenced (default = 0).

Implemented in UObject, and OGREGraphicsObjectMesh.

virtual void IGraphicsObject::GetVertices ( Out void *  pVertices,
In u16  nSubMeshIndex = 0,
In u16  nStreamIndex = 0,
In u32  nVertexDeclCount = 0,
In VertexDecl::Element *  pVertexDecl = NULL 
) [pure virtual]

Copies over the vertex buffer.

Parameters:
pVertices The returned vertex list.
nSubMeshIndex The index of the SubMesh whose vertex buffer is referenced (default = 0).
nStreamIndex Index of the Vertex Stream to return.
nVertexDeclCount Element count in the requested FVF. Value of 0 means all elements in the vertex buffer (default=0)
pVertexDecl VertexDecl Format to be used for the returned list of Vertices

Implemented in UObject, and OGREGraphicsObjectMesh.

virtual u32 IGraphicsObject::GetStreamsChanged ( void   )  [pure virtual]

Queries a system for the indices of changed vertex streams.

Returns:
A bitmask with indices of modified vertex streams.

Implemented in UObject, and OGREGraphicsObjectMesh.

) [pure virtual]
